ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(TreeItems)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(TreeCommands)

ADD_LIBRARY(TreeStructure 
  PropertiesModel.cpp
  PropertiesWidget.cpp
  TreeStructure.cpp
  TreeContextMenu.cpp
)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(TreeStructure PUBLIC
  ${VTK_LIBRARIES}
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Widgets
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::OpenGLWidgets 
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Core
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Gui
  Defaults
  Widgets
  Utils
  TreeItems
  TreeCommands
  Document
  ModelActionsHandler
)

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(TreeStructure PUBLIC
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
)

# Autogenerated uic files
if(WIN32)
  TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(TreeStructure INTERFACE 
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/GraphicalUtils_autogen/include_Release
  )
else()
  TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(TreeStructure INTERFACE 
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/GraphicalUtils_autogen/include
  )
endif()
